ViewObject.Name: XxcsoSpDecisionBm1CustFullVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_CUSTOMER_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_HEADER_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_CUSTOMER_CLASS, SUBSTRB( xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PARTY_NAME ,pvs.attribute1 ,inst.party_name ,xcasv.party_name ,cntr.party_name ,xcc.contract_name ) ,1 ,80 ) party_name, SUBSTRB( xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PARTY_NAME_ALT ,pv.vendor_name_alt ,inst.party_name_alt ,xcasv.organization_name_phonetic ,cntr.party_name_alt ,xcc.contract_name_kana ) ,1 ,320 ) party_name_alt, xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.POSTAL_CODE_FIRST ,SUBSTRB(pvs.zip, 1, 3) ,inst.postal_code_first ,SUBSTRB(xcasv.postal_code, 1, 3) ,cntr.postal_code_first ,SUBSTRB(xcc.post_code, 1, 3) ) postal_code_first, xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.POSTAL_CODE_SECOND ,SUBSTRB(pvs.zip, 4, 4) ,inst.postal_code_second ,SUBSTRB(xcasv.postal_code, 4, 4) ,cntr.postal_code_second ,SUBSTRB(xcc.post_code, 4, 4) ) postal_code_second, xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.POSTAL_CODE ,pvs.zip ,inst.postal_code ,xcasv.postal_code ,cntr.postal_code ,xcc.post_code ) postal_code, SUBSTRB( xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.STATE ,pvs.state ,null ,null ,null ,null ) ,1 ,25 ) state, SUBSTRB( xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CITY ,pvs.city ,null ,null ,null ,null ) ,1 ,25 ) city, SUBSTRB( xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.ADDRESS1 ,pvs.address_line1 ,SUBSTR(inst.state || inst.city || inst.address1 || inst.address2,1,17) ,SUBSTR(xcasv.state || xcasv.city || xcasv.address1 || xcasv.address2,1,17) ,SUBSTR(cntr.state || cntr.city || cntr.address1 || cntr.address2,1,17) ,SUBSTR(xcc.prefectures || xcc.city_ward || xcc.address_1 || xcc.address_2,1,17) ) ,1 ,35 ) address1, SUBSTRB( xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.ADDRESS2 ,pvs.address_line2 ,SUBSTR(inst.state || inst.city || inst.address1 || inst.address2,18,17) ,SUBSTR(xcasv.state || xcasv.city || xcasv.address1 || xcasv.address2,18,17) ,SUBSTR(cntr.state || cntr.city || cntr.address1 || cntr.address2,18,17) ,SUBSTR(xcc.prefectures || xcc.city_ward || xcc.address_1 || xcc.address_2,18,17) ) ,1 ,35 ) address2, xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,xsdh.bm1_send_type ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,cntr.customer_id ,cntr.same_install_account_flag ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.ADDRESS_LINES_PHONETIC ,pvs.phone ,inst.address_lines_phonetic ,xcasv.phone_number ,cntr.address_lines_phonetic ,xcc.phone_number ) address_lines_phonetic, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.INSTALL_NAME, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BUSINESS_CONDITION_TYPE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BUSINESS_TYPE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.INSTALL_LOCATION, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_OPCL_TYPE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PUBLISH_BASE_CODE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.REPRESENTATIVE_NAME, xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.TRANSFER_COMMISSION_TYPE ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,pvs.bank_charge_bearer) ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ) transfer_commission_type, DECODE(XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID,NULL,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE ,pvs.attribute4) bm_payment_type, xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.INQUIRY_BASE_CODE ,pvs.attribute5 ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ) inquiry_base_code, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.NEW_CUSTOMER_FLAG, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SAME_INSTALL_ACCOUNT_FLAG, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CREATED_BY, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CREATION_DATE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.REQUEST_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PROGRAM_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PROGRAM_UPDATE_DATE, pv.segment1 vendor_number, xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_base_name( xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.INQUIRY_BASE_CODE ,pvs.attribute5 ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ) ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) ) inquiry_base_name, xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_bm1_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.TRANSFER_COMMISSION_TYPE ,DECODE(pvs.attribute4,'4',NULL,pvs.bank_charge_bearer) ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ) transfer_commission_type_view FROM XXCSO_SP_DECISION_CUSTS_V XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO ,xxcso_sp_decision_headers xsdh ,xxcso_sp_decision_custs_v inst ,xxcso_sp_decision_custs_v cntr ,xxcso_cust_acct_sites_v xcasv ,xxcso_contract_customers xcc ,po_vendors pv ,po_vendor_sites pvs WHERE XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_CUSTOMER_CLASS = '3' AND xsdh.sp_decision_header_id = XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_HEADER_ID AND inst.sp_decision_header_id = XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_HEADER_ID AND inst.sp_decision_customer_class = '1' AND cntr.sp_decision_header_id = XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_HEADER_ID AND cntr.sp_decision_customer_class = '2' AND xcasv.cust_account_id(+) = inst.customer_id AND xcc.contract_customer_id(+) = cntr.customer_id AND pv.vendor_id(+) = XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.customer_id AND pvs.vendor_id(+) = XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.customer_id
